name: Just Two Dogs
description:
Dog is a man's best friend.

Do you like puzzles and platformer games? WELL, YOU'VE COME TO THE RIGHT PLACE! Just Two Dogs is hybrid of these two genres, offering unique puzzles and engaging platforming sections. Control two dogs, that have been kidnapped from home by a villain-businessman. They have to get back home, paying attention to the varoius obstacles in their path. Use buttons to activate different mechanisms, change between playable-characters and have fun! This game was completed in JUST A WEEK, so please keep that in mind.

  • Atmospheric pixel art visuals
  • Control two dogs
  • Solve unique puzzles in each level
